name: three-emitter
description: High performance particle emitter for THREE.js
author: riokoe

scripts.build: npx tsc -p ./build/tsconfig.esm.json && npx tsc -p ./build/tsconfig.cjs.json && npx tsc -p ./build/tsconfig.types.json && npx rollup --config ./build/rollup.config.js
scripts.docs: npx typedoc src/index.ts --gitRevision main --highlightLanguages typescript --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --entryFileName index.md --indexFormat table --parametersFormat table --classPropertiesFormat table --enumMembersFormat table --typeDeclarationFormat table --propertyMembersFormat table --interfacePropertiesFormat table --mergeReadme false --hideBreadcrumbs true --excludeExternals && rm -rf docs/_media && mv docs/globals.md docs/index.md
